content: The Scorpion Prince can be found in the courtyard of a small settlement in the Webbed Hollow. To get there from the Verdure Bridge Keeper's Shrine, take the path on the left of the Shrine (if you're facing it) and follow it to the right to head through the large rocks. Drop down the two small platforms and climb the stairs opposite to find yourself in the settlement. The Scorpion Prince is waiting by the tree with a Luojia Fragrant Vine") growing on it.

The content is as follows:
The Scorpion Prince can be found in the courtyard of a small settlement in the Webbed Hollow. To get there from the Verdure Bridge Keeper's Shrine, take the path on the left of the Shrine (if you're facing it) and follow it to the right to head through the large rocks. Drop down the two small platforms and climb the stairs opposite to find yourself in the settlement. The Scorpion Prince is waiting by the tree with a Luojia Fragrant Vine") growing on it.
